settings.title: Tackles hair loss across entire scalp
Travel Health
settings.subtitle: Men’s bodies go through major changes throughout their lives. Each stage requires new types of care and consideration.

settings.title: What is hair loss?
settings.text: Male pattern baldness occurs when longer, darker hairs that once grew on the scalp are replaced by thinner, shorter, less pigmented hairs. This is due to dihydrotestosterone (DHT), a hormone derived from testosterone.

settings.title: Can hair loss be treated?
settings.text: Male pattern baldness occurs when longer, darker hairs that once grew on the scalp are replaced by thinner, shorter, less pigmented hairs. This is due to dihydrotestosterone (DHT), a hormone derived from testosterone.

settings.title: Thyroid condition
settings.text: According to the ATA at thyroid.org, more than 12% of the adult population will develop a thyroid condition during their lifetime.

settings.title: How does your subscription work?
settings.text: Free thyroxine also referred to as T4 . It works to speed up the metabolism and is one of the two hormones produced by the thyroid gland. This test will only look to identify free T4 which means the the thyroxine is unbound in the body. Only when excessive T4 is unbound does it symbolise an issue.
